content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (5, 7), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 1: 初期配置確認。自空母は(5,7)、敵空母は(26,26)付近と予想される。距離約24ヘクス。航空部隊の作戦行動半径は22ヘクスなので、現在位置からは敵空母に届かない。まず索敵を開始し、敵空母の正確な位置を特定する必要がある。作戦：(1)空母を南東方向へ移動開始し敵空母との距離を詰める。目標(12,14)付近へ移動。(2)ASQ1を(27,29)方向へ発艦させ、敵空母の初期位置(26,26)付近を索敵。(3)ASQ2は予備として待機。敵発見後の第二波攻撃に備える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 12, "y": 14}, "launch_target": {"x": 27, "y": 29}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=27 y=29 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=19 y=23.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 1修正: 航続距離22ヘクスの制約を考慮。自空母(5,7)から距離22以内に目標を設定する必要がある。(27,29)は距離約28で範囲外だった。敵空母推定位置(26,26)に近く、かつ範囲内の座標として(19,23)を選択。これは距離約19ヘクスで範囲内。作戦：(1)空母を(12,14)へ移動開始し敵に接近。(2)ASQ1を(19,23)へ発艦させ南東海域を索敵。(3)ASQ2は次ターン以降の索敵・攻撃に備えて待機。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 12, "y": 14}, "launch_target": {"x": 19, "y": 23}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (19, 23) while at (7, 10).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 9), en route to target (12, 14), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (7, 10), outbound toward (19, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 2: ASQ1は(7,10)から(19,23)へ向けて飛行中。空母は(6,9)から(12,14)へ移動中。敵の発見報告なし。ASQ1は目標到着まで約3ターン必要。空母の移動を継続し、ASQ2を別方向へ発艦させて索敵範囲を広げる。敵空母は(26,26)付近と推定されるが、より広範囲を索敵するため、ASQ2を(20,29)方向へ発艦。これは空母(6,9)から距離約21ヘクスで範囲内。2機で異なる海域を索敵し、敵空母発見の確率を高める。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 20, "y": 29}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=20 y=29 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=19 y=28.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 2修正: 空母(6,9)から距離22以内の座標を指定する必要がある。(20,29)は距離約22.8で範囲外。推奨された(19,28)は距離約21で範囲内。ASQ1は(19,23)を索敵中、ASQ2は(19,28)でより南方を索敵。これにより南東海域を広範囲にカバーできる。空母は(12,14)への移動を継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 19, "y": 28}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 18) while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (19, 28) while at (8, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 18) (previously at (11, 18)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 11), en route to target (12, 14), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 14), outbound toward (19, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (8, 12), outbound toward (19, 28), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 3: 重要な発見！ASQ1が(11,18)で敵航空部隊BSQ1を発見。敵機の位置から敵空母の位置を推定できる。BSQ1が(11,18)にいるということは、敵空母はその航続距離22ヘクス以内に存在する。敵空母の初期位置は(26,26)付近のはずだが、(11,18)から距離約19なので、敵空母が西方向へ移動してきている可能性が高い。敵空母の推定位置：(11,18)から東方向22ヘクス以内、おそらく(20,25)～(28,28)の範囲。ASQ1は(19,23)へ継続、ASQ2は(19,28)へ継続して索敵。空母は現在(7,11)で(12,14)へ移動中。敵機が西側にいるため、空母をさらに南東へ進めて索敵範囲を広げる。目標を(15,18)に変更し、次ターン以降の攻撃準備を整える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=15 y=18 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=14 y=17.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 3修正: (15,18)は陸地だった。推奨された(14,17)は海上で有効。敵航空部隊BSQ1が(11,18)で発見されたことから、敵空母は東方向に存在すると推定。BSQ1の航続距離22ヘクスを考慮すると、敵空母は(11,18)から22ヘクス以内、おそらく(20,24)～(28,28)の範囲。ASQ1とASQ2は索敵継続中。空母を(14,17)へ移動させ、敵空母発見後の攻撃準備を整える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 17}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (9, 14) while at (8, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 22) while at (11, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (9, 14) while at (11, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (11, 18) while at (11, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (9, 14) while at (10, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (11, 18) while at (10, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 22) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (9, 14) (previously at (11, 18)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (11, 18) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 13), en route to target (14, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (11, 17), outbound toward (12, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 15), outbound toward (19, 28), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 4: 決定的な発見！ASQ1が敵空母BC1を(12,22)で発見し、自動的に攻撃目標に変更された。敵空母は予想より遥かに西側に位置していた。敵航空部隊BSQ1は(9,14)、BSQ2は(11,18)で確認。敵機が我が空母(8,13)に接近中の可能性がある。BSQ1は距離約2で非常に近い！危険な状況。作戦：(1)ASQ1は敵空母(12,22)への攻撃を継続。(2)ASQ2の目標を敵空母(12,22)に変更し、第二波攻撃を準備。(3)空母は敵機から離脱するため、西方向へ緊急回避。目標を(2,8)に変更し、敵の索敵範囲から逃れる。敵空母を先に発見できたので有利だが、敵機が近いため空母の安全確保が最優先。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 8}, "launch_target": {"x": 12, "y": 22}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 4修正: ASQ2は既に飛行中のため発艦指示は不要。ASQ1は敵空母(12,22)への攻撃中。ASQ2は(19,28)へ向かっているが、敵空母発見により目標変更が必要だが、飛行中の航空部隊には指示できない。空母の安全確保が最優先。敵航空部隊BSQ1が(9,14)で我が空母(8,13)から距離1と極めて近い。BSQ2も(11,18)にいる。空母を敵機の索敵範囲外へ緊急退避させる。西方向の(2,8)へ移動し、敵の攻撃を回避する。ASQ1が敵空母を攻撃し、その間に空母を安全な位置へ移動させる戦術。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 8}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ1) while at (8, 13).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ1) causing 23 damage while at (8, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (9, 14) while at (11, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (9, 15) while at (12, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (9, 14) while at (12, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (9, 15) while at (12, 18).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (8, 15) while at (8, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 23) while at (12, 21).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 23) while at (12, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 23) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (9, 14) (previously at (11, 18)), HP 19/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (8, 15) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 13), en route to target (2, 8), HP 77/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 21), outbound toward (12, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (12, 19), outbound toward (12, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 5: 状況急変！我が空母AC1が敵航空部隊BSQ1を対空攻撃し23ダメージを与えた(HP19/40)。しかし空母もHP77/100と23ダメージを受けた。敵BSQ2が(8,15)に接近中で非常に危険。両航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2は敵空母BC1(12,23)への攻撃に向かっている。敵空母は(12,22)→(12,23)と南へ1ヘクス移動。ASQ1は(12,21)、ASQ2は(12,19)から敵空母へ接近中。次ターンには攻撃可能。空母は(8,13)から(2,8)へ退避中だが、敵BSQ2が(8,15)と距離2で追跡中。このまま西へ逃げ続けるべきか、方向転換すべきか。敵機の移動パターンから、BSQ2は南西方向へ移動している。空母を北西方向(2,6)へ変更し、敵の予想進路から外れる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 6}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (10, 16) while at (8, 12).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (8, 12) while at (7, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 24) while at (13, 24).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 24) while at (11, 23).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 18) while at (11, 23).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (13, 24).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (11, 23).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 24) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 18) (previously at (11, 18)), HP 19/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (8, 12) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 11), en route to target (2, 6), HP 77/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (13, 24), engaging an enemy target at (12, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (11, 23), engaging an enemy target at (12, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 6: 重要な展開！ASQ1とASQ2が敵空母BC1(12,24)への攻撃を開始。両機とも攻撃位置に到達し交戦中。次ターンで敵空母に大ダメージを与えられる見込み。しかし我が空母は危機的状況。敵BSQ2が(8,12)で空母(7,11)と同じ位置に到達！距離0で攻撃を受ける可能性が極めて高い。BSQ1も(11,18)で健在(HP19/40)。空母HP77/100で既に損傷。敵空母は(12,24)と南へ移動継続中。作戦：空母を敵機から緊急離脱。BSQ2が(8,12)にいるため、北西方向へ全速退避。目標を(3,5)に変更し、敵の索敵・攻撃範囲から逃れる。ASQ1とASQ2は敵空母攻撃を継続し、早期撃沈を目指す。敵空母を撃沈できれば勝利確定。空母の生存が最優先課題。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 3, "y": 5}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (13, 24).
- your squadron(ASQ1) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 16 damage while at (13, 24).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (13, 24).
- your squadron(ASQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (11, 23).
- your squadron(ASQ2) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 18 damage while at (11, 23).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 23).
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ2) while at (7, 11).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ2) causing 24 damage while at (7, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (12, 22) while at (13, 24).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (12, 22) while at (11, 23).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 24) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 50/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (12, 22) (previously at (11, 18)), HP 19/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (8, 12) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 11), en route to target (3, 5), HP 53/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (13, 24), returning to the carrier, HP 24/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (11, 23), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 7: 大きな戦果！ASQ1が敵空母に16ダメージ、ASQ2が18ダメージを与え、敵空母BC1はHP50/100と半減。両航空部隊は帰還中。我が空母も敵BSQ2に24ダメージを与えた(HP26/40)が、空母自身もHP53/100と損傷が拡大。敵BSQ1(HP19/40)が(12,22)に位置。両航空部隊は損傷(ASQ1:HP24/40、ASQ2:HP22/40)しているが帰還中。空母は(7,11)から(3,5)へ退避中。敵空母HP50/100なので、もう一度攻撃すれば撃沈可能。しかし航空部隊が帰還して再発艦するまで時間がかかる。その間に敵機から攻撃を受ける可能性がある。空母を安全な位置へ移動させ、航空部隊の帰還を待つ。目標(3,5)への移動を継続。帰還後、整備・再発艦して敵空母への第二波攻撃を実施する計画。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (9, 14) while at (7, 10).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (12, 24) while at (11, 21).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 25) while at (11, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (12, 24) while at (11, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (12, 25) while at (12, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (10, 16) while at (12, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (10, 16) while at (10, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 25) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 50/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (10, 16) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 9), en route to target (3, 5), HP 53/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 24/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 8: 敵空母BC1は(12,25)へ南下継続中、HP50/100。敵BSQ1の情報が消えた(撃墜された可能性)。敵BSQ2は(10,16)でHP26/40。我が航空部隊は帰還中：ASQ1(12,20)、ASQ2(10,19)。空母は(6,9)で(3,5)へ退避中。敵BSQ2が(9,14)で確認されたが、空母から距離約5で比較的安全。航空部隊の帰還まであと数ターン。敵空母HP50/100なので次の攻撃で撃沈可能。空母を(3,5)へ移動継続し、航空部隊の帰還を待つ。帰還後すぐに再発艦させ、敵空母(12,25)付近へ第二波攻撃を実施する。敵空母は南下しているので、次回の目標は(12,27)付近を予測。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (11, 20) while at (10, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (11, 20) while at (8, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 25) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 50/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (11, 20) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (5, 7), en route to target (3, 5), HP 53/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (10, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 24/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (8, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 9: 空母は(5,7)で初期位置に戻りつつある。目標(3,5)まであと1ターン。航空部隊は帰還中：ASQ1(10,16)、ASQ2(8,15)。敵BSQ2が(11,20)で確認、HP26/40。敵空母BC1は(12,25)でHP50/100。航空部隊があと数ターンで帰還予定。帰還後すぐに再発艦させて敵空母への第二波攻撃を実施する。敵空母は南下傾向なので次の目標は(12,27)付近と予測。空母の移動を継続し、航空部隊の帰還を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 25) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 50/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (11, 20) (previously at (12, 20)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 6), en route to target (3, 5), HP 53/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (8, 12), returning to the carrier, HP 24/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (6, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 10: 空母は(4,6)で目標(3,5)まであと1ヘクス。航空部隊は帰還中：ASQ1(8,12)、ASQ2(6,11)。空母まで距離4-5なので、あと1-2ターンで帰還・着艦予定。敵空母BC1はHP50/100で(12,25)が最終確認位置。敵BSQ2はHP26/40で(11,20)。空母を(3,5)へ移動完了させ、航空部隊の帰還を待つ。次ターン以降、着艦後すぐに再発艦させて敵空母への決定的な第二波攻撃を実施する。敵空母の現在位置を(12,27)付近と予測し、そこを目標に設定する準備。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (12, 25) (previously at (12, 22)), HP 50/100.
- No enemy squadrons are currently visible.
